translations: 分（菲律宾、墨西哥和南美洲某些国家的辅币单位, centavo 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Woman gives two centavos to some little beggar boy.
sentences.translation: 女人给街边小乞丐两分钱。

sentences.sentence: The BIR, recently in negotiations with Sicpa to lower the cost of its technology to manufacturers who will bear the added burden, has reduced this by at least 20 centavos.
sentences.translation: 税务局最近同锡克拜谈判，以降低制造商将要承担的额外负担，至少把这种负担降低20分。
